page.title: 19Country Park
page.content: The block has within its boundaries a small country park area under the title Sidings Lane Picnic Area. The park is under the control of St. Helens Borough Council. The park has its own Ranger who is responsible for the care and protection of the land and facilities. The area is primarily woodland taking in Kenyon's Wood. There are plenty of short paths which lead into large open patches of grassland. Spread around are benches and tables suitable for picnics. All throughout the area are parking spots in order to provide easy access. The spot is also popular with local fishermen as the park has a well stocked pond.
